 10#ifndef VSIP_CORE_PROXY_LOCAL_BLOCK_HPP
 11#define VSIP_CORE_PROXY_LOCAL_BLOCK_HPP
 12
 13#include <vsip/core/layout.hpp>
 14#include <vsip/core/parallel/local_map.hpp>
 15
 16namespace vsip
 17{
 18namespace impl
 19{
 20
 21template <dimension_type Dim,
 22	  typename       T,
 23	  typename       LP>
 24class Proxy_local_block
 25{
 26  // Compile-time values and types.
 27public:
 28  static dimension_type const dim = Dim;
 29
 30  typedef T        value_type;
 31  typedef T&       reference_type;
 32  typedef T const& const_reference_type;
 33
 34  typedef Local_map map_type;
 35
 36  // Implementation types.
 37public:
 38  typedef LP                       layout_type;
 39  typedef impl::Applied_layout<LP> applied_layout_type;
 40
 41  // Constructors and destructor.
 42public:
 43  Proxy_local_block(Length<Dim> const& size)
 44    : layout_(size)
 45  {}
 46
 47  // Data accessors.
 48public:
 49  // No get, put.
 50
 51  // Direct_data interface.
 52public:
 53  stride_type impl_offset() VSIP_NOTHROW
 54  { return 0; }
 55
 56  // NO // impl_data_type       impl_data()       VSIP_NOTHROW
 57
 58  // NO // impl_const_data_type impl_data() const VSIP_NOTHROW
 59
 60  stride_type impl_stride(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d)
 61    const VSIP_NOTHROW
 62  {
 63    assert((block_dim == 1 || block_dim == Dim) && (d < block_dim));
 64    return (block_dim == 1) ? 1 : layout_.stride(d);
 65  }
 66
 67  // Accessors.
 68public:
 69  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW
 70  {
 71    length_type retval = layout_.size(0);
 72    for (dimension_type d=1; d<Dim; ++d)
 73      retval *= layout_.size(d);
 74    return retval;
 75  }
 76
 77  length_type size(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d)
 78    const VSIP_NOTHROW
 79  {
 80    assert((block_dim == 1 || block_dim == Dim) && (d < block_dim));
 81    return (block_dim == 1) ? this->size() : this->layout_.size(d);
 82  }
 83
 84  map_type const& map() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return map_; }
 85
 86
 87  // Member data.
 88private:
 89  applied_layout_type layout_;
 90  map_type            map_;
 91};
 92
 93
 94
 95// Store Proxy_local_block by-value.
 96template <dimension_type Dim,
 97	  typename       T,
 98	  typename       LP>
 99struct View_block_storage<Proxy_local_block<Dim, T, LP> >
100  : By_value_block_storage<Proxy_local_block<Dim, T, LP> >
101{};
102
103
104template <dimension_type Dim,
105	  typename       T,
106	  typename       LP>
107struct Block_layout<Proxy_local_block<Dim, T, LP> >
108{
109  static dimension_type const dim = Dim;
110
111  typedef Direct_access_tag         access_type;
112  typedef typename LP::order_type   order_type;
113  typedef typename LP::pack_type    pack_type;
114  typedef typename LP::complex_type complex_type;
115
116  typedef Layout<dim, order_type, pack_type, complex_type> layout_type;
117};
118
119} // namespace vsip::impl
120} // namespace vsip

124#endif // VSIP_CORE_PROXY_LOCAL_BLOCK_HPP
